CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 16, 1965, pg. 7 reads: "Alpha Wives - When the Alphas held their social meeting and installed new officers, at the Pick-Roosevelt Hotel, their wives were special guests. Officers of the Alpha WIves also were installed.  Left to right: Mmes. Gloria Frazier, president; Elise Bennett (standing in for Jane Tresville, vice president); Connie Cundieff, recording secretary; Madelyn Hairston (standing in for Mary Jane Page, corresponding secretary); Gladys McCullough, financial secretary, and Miriam Fountain, treasurer.-Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Six women, officers of the Alpha Wives, left to right, Gloria Frazier, Elise Bennett (standing in for Jane Tresville), Connie Cundieff, Madelyn Hairston (standing in for Mary Jane Page), Gladys McCullough, and Miriam Fountain, standing in Pick-Roosevelt Hotel
